name: Moist Fart!
frontBottom: SHAME BR If TURNED, exchange it for a Meed for all (or other card, if not possible) with another player.
frontTop: SHAME BR When this card TURNED, exchange it for a Meed for all (or other card, if not possible) with another player.

name: Boogie Dance
frontBottom: SHAME BR MOVE 1 card in your hand to another position.
frontTop: PRIDE BR MOVE 2 cards in your hand to another position.

name: Mead for all
frontBottom: SHAME BR Everyone TURNs 1 of their cards.
frontTop: PRIDE BR Pick 1 card name, everyone TURNs that card.

name: Drink Splash
frontBottom: SHAME BR TURN 2 cards to the left of this card.
frontTop: PRIDE BR TURN your whole hand upside down.

name: Butt Kick
frontBottom: SHAME BR TURN 1 of your cards BLUE and TURN 1 of your cards GOLD.
frontTop: PRIDE BR TURN 1 of your cards BLUE and TURN 2 cards GOLD.

name: Pass a Pipe
frontBottom: SHAME BR Pick a position, everyone PASSes a card on that position to the next player.
frontTop: PRIDE BR Pick a position, everyone TURNs a card on that position.

name: Bear Hug
frontBottom: SHAME BR TURN 1 card on the left or right to this one.
frontTop: PRIDE BR TURN both cards to the left or right to this one.
